variables.name: fabric_environment
variables.note: The environment name for Fabric deployment (e.g., dev, prod).

variables.name: fabric_deployment_workspace_id
variables.note: The id of the workspace that this solution will be deployed to.

variables.name: synapse_source_sql_connection
variables.note: Connection string or name for the source Synapse SQL database.

variables.name: synapse_source_database_1
variables.note: Name of the primary source Synapse database.

variables.name: config_workspace_name
variables.note: Name of the workspace used for configuration.

variables.name: config_workspace_id
variables.note: ID of the workspace used for configuration.

variables.name: config_warehouse_id
variables.note: The id of the warehouse that will store configuration tables. Note, this setting is mutually exclusive with config_lakehouse_id. If config_lakehouse_id is set, this variable will be ignored.

variables.name: edw_workspace_id
variables.note: ID of the EDW (Enterprise Data Warehouse) workspace.

variables.name: legacy_synapse_connection_name
variables.note: Name of the legacy Synapse connection, if applicable.

variables.name: synapse_export_shortcut_path_in_onelake
variables.note: Path in OneLake for Synapse export shortcut.

variables.name: raw_datastore_id
variables.note: ID of the raw datastore (lakehouse or warehouse).
